PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-03902010-03-25,  ,  ,  FIN, 
ActBank Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Bank Holding Company Proposal Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the BANK HOLDING COMPANY PROPOSAL REGULATIONS to update a cross-reference to a section that was renumbered as a result of changes made in Bill C-37, (Act to amend the law governing financial institutions and to provide for related and consequential matters) namely by replacing the terms “subsection 973(1)” with “section 973”.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2010-0070 Publication Date: 2010-04-14
AttachmentsAttachment
